name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

evolution.name: Ivysaur
evolution.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Charmander
description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

evolution.name: Charmeleon
evolution.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It sprays a potent foam from its mouth.

evolution.name: Wartortle
evolution.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

name: Pikachu
description: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

evolution.name: Raichu
evolution.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

name: Jigglypuff
description: When its huge eyes waver, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

evolution.name: Wigglytuff
evolution.description: Its body is very soft. Once it inflates, it can bounce like a balloon.

name: Meowth
description: Adores circular objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

evolution.name: Persian
evolution.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

evolution.name: Golduck
evolution.description: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Machop
description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

evolution.name: Machoke
evolution.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Gastly
description: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

evolution.name: Haunter
evolution.description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: Eevee
description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from elemental stones.

evolution.name: Vaporeon
evolution.description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin that is often mistaken for a mermaid's.
